Articles.Content: Hi everyone, I am new here.
Hello there, I've been around a while! Fly safe, now.

Hello rodsmith and welcome to the forums! If you have any question, don't be afraid to ask. This is a pretty damn sweet and helpful community ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
